title: Junkies
description: Two Junkies.Both have an addiction.Both of them struggle.One is in and out of the prison system.Lived in the foster system.Lost his family.Finally, he finds love.But, is it possible for two junkies to collide, find love, and live a happy ever after?Death.Love.Loss.One blink is all it takes.One regret.One mistake.One lie.And your whole world will come tumbling down.
author: Mikey B.
